mapper.select: SELECT A.OG_NM AS THM_BRANCH /*당월지점*/ , A.FST_CNTR_DT AS TASK_RGS /*업무등록*/ , NVL(B.PERF_VAL,0) AS STMNT_NMN /*LCCNT1 정착차월*/ , A.PSTN_DV_CD ||'직급 / '|| C.CD_CNTN AS THM_CRLV /*당월직책*/ , A.CNTR_DT AS WM_OPNG /*WM개시 */ , A.CLTN_DT AS WM_CLTN /*WM해약 일정조회 수정여부 가능 차후 추가예정*/ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG B ON A.BASE_YM = B.BASE_YM AND A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO AND B.CL_DV_CD = '02' AND B.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = 'W023110101' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D C ON A.RSB_DV_CD = C.CD_VLD_VAL AND C.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'RSB_DV_CD' WHERE A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND A.OG_TP_CD = 'W02'

SELECT CD_NM AS CD_NM , MAX(CNT1) AS CNT1 , MAX(CNT2) AS CNT2 , MAX(AMT1) AS AMT1 , MAX(CNT3) AS CNT3 , MAX(CNT4) AS CNT4 , MAX(AMT2) AS AMT2 , MAX(AMT1)+MAX(AMT2) AS SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CD_NM , NVL(SUM(COL1),0) AS CNT1 , NVL(SUM(COL2),0) AS CNT2 , NVL(SUM(COL3),0) AS AMT1 , 0 AS CNT3 , 0 AS CNT4 , 0 AS AMT2 FROM ( SELECT GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDN1 AS CD_NM , CASE WHEN GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV4 = '01' THEN BS.PERF_VAL END AS COL1 , CASE WHEN GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV4 = '02' THEN BS.PERF_VAL END AS COL2 , CASE WHEN GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV4 = '04' THEN BS.PERF_VAL END AS COL3 FROM TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG BS INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_ATC_CD GI ON BS.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = GI.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD AND GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV1 = CASE WHEN BS.BASE_YM < '202207' THEN '01' ELSE '08' END /*202207년 이후는 구분코드 08*/ AND GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV2 = '01' /*일반*/ AND BS.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND BS.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND BS.CL_DV_CD = '02' AND BS.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' ) GROUP BY CD_NM UNION SELECT CD_NM , 0 AS CNT1 , 0 AS CNT2 , 0 AS AMT1 , CASE WHEN BASE_YM < '202207' THEN 0 ELSE NVL(SUM(COL1),0) END AS CNT3 /*202007 이전은 정액 0원*/ , CASE WHEN BASE_YM < '202207' THEN 0 ELSE NVL(SUM(COL2),0) END AS CNT4 , CASE WHEN BASE_YM < '202207' THEN 0 ELSE NVL(SUM(COL3),0) END AS AMT2 FROM ( SELECT GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDN1 AS CD_NM , BS.BASE_YM , CASE WHEN GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV4 = '01' THEN BS.PERF_VAL END AS COL1 , CASE WHEN GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV4 = '02' THEN BS.PERF_VAL END AS COL2 , CASE WHEN GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV4 = '04' THEN BS.PERF_VAL END AS COL3 FROM TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG BS INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_ATC_CD GI ON BS.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = GI.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD AND GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV1 = CASE WHEN BS.BASE_YM < '202207' THEN '01' ELSE '08' END /*202207년 이후는 구분코드 08*/ AND GI.PRTNR_PERF_DTLP_ATC_CDV2 = '02' /*정액*/ AND BS.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND BS.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND BS.CL_DV_CD = '02' AND BS.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' ) GROUP BY CD_NM, BASE_YM ) GROUP BY CD_NM ORDER BY CD_NM

SELECT #{no} AS PRTNR_NO , #{perfYm} AS BASE_YM , C.OG_TP_CD , C.FEE_NM , C.FEE_CD , NVL(D.FEE_CALC_AMT,'0') AS FEE_CALC_AMT , NVL(D.FEE_CTR_CNFM_AMT,'0') AS FEE_CTR_CNFM_AMT , D.FEE_CTR_RSON_CN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.OG_TP_CD , B.FEE_CD , B.FEE_CALC_AMT , B.FEE_CTR_CNFM_AMT , B.FEE_CTR_RSON_CN FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CALC_BAS B ON A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO AND A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.BASE_YM = B.BASE_YM AND B.FEE_CD IN ( 'W020084', 'W020085' ,'W020028' ,'W020027' ,'W020086' ,'W020026' ,'W020082' ,'W020008', 'W020077') WHERE A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{no} )D ON C.FEE_CD = D.FEE_CD AND C.OG_TP_CD = D.OG_TP_CD WHERE C.FEE_CD IN ('W020084', 'W020085', 'W020028', 'W020027','W020086' ,'W020026', 'W020082', 'W020008', 'W020077') ORDER BY C.FEE_NM

SELECT NVL(VISIT_RECORD,0) AS VISIT_RECORD /*LCCNT2 + LCCNT3 방문실적*/ , NVL(PROCS_RT,0) AS PROCS_RT /*LCAMT1 처리율*/ , NVL(PD_ACC_CNT,0) AS PD_ACC_CNT /*LCCNT1 BS인정건수*/ , NVL(W1_CNT,0) AS W1_CNT /*LCCNT2 W1건수*/ , NVL(W2_CNT,0) AS W2_CNT /*LCCNT3 W2건수*/ , NVL(ENVR_CNT,0) AS ENVR_CNT /*LCCNT1 환경건수*/ FROM ( SELECT PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD , PERF_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG WHERE BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND CL_DV_CD = '1' AND OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD IN ('199991','199992','199993','261','6111','6112','251') ) PIVOT ( SUM(PERF_VAL) FOR PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD IN ( '199991' AS VISIT_RECORD , '199992' AS PROCS_RT , '261' AS PD_ACC_CNT , '6111' AS W1_CNT , '6112' AS W2_CNT , '251' AS ENVR_CNT ) )

SELECT DDCTAM AS DDTN_SUM , DSB_OJ_AMT AS DSB_SUM , (DSB_OJ_AMT - DDCTAM) AS DSB_TAM FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ E WHERE DSB_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS( #{perfYm}||'01', '1' ),'YYYYMM' ) AND ( DDCTAM > 0 OR DSB_OJ_AMT > 0 ) AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND OG_TP_CD = 'W02'

FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CALC_BAS WHERE PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} AND FEE_CD = #{feeCd} AND FEE_CALC_AMT = #{feeCalcAmt}
